result.value: The base class from which to create a CWRC-Writer XML editor.

The [Canadian Writing Research Collaboratory (CWRC)](https://cwrc.ca/) has developed an in-browser text markup editor (CWRC-Writer) for use by individual scholars and collaborative scholarly editing projects that require a light-weight online editing environment. This package is the base code that builds on the TinyMCE editor, and is meant to be bundled together with two other packages that provide document storage and entity lookup. A default version of the CWRC-Writer that uses GitHub for storage is available for anyone's use at [https://cwrc-writer.cwrc.ca/](https://cwrc-writer.cwrc.ca/).

CWRC-Writer is a WYSIWYG text editor for in-browser XML editing and stand-off RDF annotation.  
It is built around a heavily customized version of the [TinyMCE](https://www.tiny.cloud/) editor, and includes a CWRC-hosted XML validation service. 
A CWRC-Writer installation is a bundling of the main CWRC-WriterBase (the code in this repository) with  
a few other NPM packages that handle interaction with server-side services for document storage and named entity lookup. 
The default implementation of the CWRC-Writer is the [CWRC-GitWriter](https://github.com/cwrc/cwrc-gitwriter). It uses
GitHub to store documents via the [cwrc-git-dialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/cwrc-git-dialogs) package. Entity lookups for [VIAF](https://viaf.org), [WikiData](https://www.wikidata.org), [DBpedia](http://wiki.dbpedia.org),
[Getty](http://vocab.getty.edu) and [GeoNames](https://www.geonames.org/) are provided via [CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs) and related [lookup packages](https://github.com/cwrc?q=entity-lookup).

If you choose not to use either the default GitHub storage or named entity lookups, then most of the
work in setting up CWRC-Writer for your project will be in implementing the dialogs to interact with your backend storage
and/or named entity lookups. We have split these pieces off into their own packages in large part to make it easier to
substitute your own dialogs and supporting services. 
A good example to follow when creating a new CWRC-Writer project is our public implementation
[CWRC-GitWriter](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-GitWriter). You might also choose to use either the
[GitHub storage dialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/cwrc-git-dialogs) or the [named entity lookups](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs), both of which are used by the CWRC-GitWriter,
and replace just one of the two. To help understand how we've developed the CWRC-Writer, you could also
look at our [development docs](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-Writer-Dev-Docs). 
To replace either of the storage and entity dialogs, you'll need to create modules with the following APIs:

Note that because the `load(writer)` and `save(writer)` methods are passed an instance of the CWRC-WriterBase, all of the methods defined below in the [API](#writer-object) are available, in order to allow getting and setting of XML in the editor.

1. You can implement your own dialog for entity lookup, following the model in
   [CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs) 
2. You can use [CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs) and configure it with different
   sources. We provide five sources: VIAF, Wikidata, Getty, DBpedia, and GeoNames. 
You can use any of these sources, and supplement them with your own sources. [CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-PublicEntityDialogs) fully explains how to add your own sources.

The object returned by the constructor is defined here: [writer.js](src/js/writer.js). The typical properties and methods you'd want to use when implementing your own storage and/or entity dialogs are:
_Loads an XML document (either a [XML Document](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/XMLDocument) or a stringified version of such) into the editor._
_A convenience method which calls either `loadDocumentURL` or `loadDocumentXML` based on the parameter provided._
_Returns the parsed XML document from the editor. If `asString` is true, then a stringified version of the document is returned._
_Convenience method to call the `load` method of the object set in the `storageDialogs` property of the config object passed to the writer._
_Convenience method to call the `save` method of the object set in the `storageDialogs` property of the config object passed to the writer._

callback(w, valid): function where w is the writer and valid is true/false.
Fires a `documentValidated` event if validation is successful.
Handles conversion of entities to annotations and vice-versa.

Handles schema loading and schema CSS processing. Stores the list of available schemas, as well as the current schema. Handles the creation of schema-appropriate entities, via the [Mapper](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/blob/master/src/js/schema/mapper.js).
Handles the creation and modification of [entities](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/blob/master/src/js/entities/entity.js). Stores the list of entities in the current document.

Handles the dissemination of events through the CWRC-Writer using a publication-subscribe pattern. See the [code](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/blob/master/src/js/eventManager.js) for the full list of events.
Handles the initialization and display of the modules specified in the `modules` property of the config object. Also handles browser resizing and fullscreen functionality.
Handles the initialization and display of dialogs.
Displays the markup of the current document in a tree format. Useful for navigating and modifying the document.
Displays the list of entities in the current document. Allows for modifying, copying, scraping, and deleting of entities.
Displays the markup of the text that's selected in the current document.
Requests and displays the results of document validation. See [validate](#validate-callback).

Displays the list of entity relationships (i.e. RDF triples) in the current document. Uses [triple](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/blob/master/src/js/dialogs/triple.js) to add new relationships.

A CWRC-Writer installation is a bundling of the main CWRC-WriterBase (the code in this repository) with  
a few other NPM packages that handle interaction with server-side services for document storage and named entity lookup.
To replace either of the storage and entity dialogs, you'll need to create modules with the following APIs:

- `config.cwrcRootUrl`: String. An absolute URL that should point to the root of the CWRC-Writer directory. If blank, the browser URL will be used.
- `config.modules`: Object. The internal CWRC-WriterBase [modules](#modules) to load, grouped by their locations relative to the CWRC-Writer. A module ID must be provided. An optional display title can be specified. Certain modules require additional configuration. 
  ```js
  config.modules = {
    west: [
      {id: 'structure', title: 'Markup'},
      {id: 'entities'}
    ],
    east: [
      {id: 'selection'}
    ],
    south: [
      {id: 'validation', config: {'validationUrl': 'https://validator.services.cwrc.ca/validator/validate.html'}}
    ]
  }
  ``` 
- `config.annotator`: Boolean. If true, the user may only add annotations to the document.
- `config.readonly`: Boolean. If true, the user may not edit nor annotate the document.
- `config.mode`: String. The mode in which to start the CWRC-Writer: `xml` or `xmlrdf`.
- `config.allowOverlap`: Boolean. Should overlapping entities be allowed initially?
- `config.schemas`: Object. A map of schema objects that can be used in the CWRC-Writer. Each entry should contain the following:
  - `id`: String. The schema id.
  - `name`: String. The schema title.
  - `schemaMappingsId`: String. The directory name in the [schema directory](src/js/schema) from which to load mapping and dialogs files for the schema.
  - `xmlUrl`: Array. A list of URLs that links to the schema (RELAX NG) file. CWRC-Griter will load the first in the list. Alternative URL can be used in the rare case that you want to match against a particular schema URL, but load the schema from another location (e.g. to avoid CORS errors).
  - `cssUrl`: Array. A list of URLs that links to the CSS associated with this schema.
- `config.buttons1`, `config.buttons2`, `config.buttons3`: String. A comma separated list of buttons to display in the CWRC-Writer toolbars. Possible values: `schematags, addperson, addplace, adddate, addorg, addcitation, addnote, addtitle, addcorrection, addkeyword, addlink, editTag, removeTag, addtriple, toggletags, viewmarkup, editsource, validate, savebutton, loadbutton, logoutbutton, fullscreen`.
_Returns the raw, un-parsed HTML content from the editor._
Modules are self-contained components that add extra functionality to CWRC-Writer. These can be specified in the configuration object using the proper module ID.

result.description:
# [8.2.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v8.1.0...v8.2.0) (2021-08-07)


### Features

* 🎸 Bump up version ([3f35748](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/3f35748f52569426c646416f8f05cd5ef62daf8c))
result.name: v8.2.0

result.description:
# [8.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v7.0.5...v8.0.0) (2021-07-30)


### Bug Fixes

* **schema manager:** fetch schema: use new proxy endpoints ([c54d0a2](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/c54d0a21e4e9de9a3a52f57ae854c4dd9a58f10b))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **schema manager:** This is a minor breaking changes. If the endpoints were not setup on GitWriter
config, this won’t affect you. If you do use these proxy endpoints, consult GitWrtier and GitServer
repos to learn how what changed in the config file.
result.name: v8.0.0

result.description:

result.description:
# [7.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v6.0.0...v7.0.0) (2020-12-04)


### Bug Fixes

* **annotation:** fix issues with annotations been overwritten when saved ([9e3c0cf](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/9e3c0cfd0b5c949aaf09726223309e28ea17572e)), closes [#282](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/282)
* **annotation:** get app version from package.json and app id from the current CWRC-Writer instance ([cc52a20](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/cc52a2060e6ca2a2e1aecbd0358ac5cb66c34e30))
* **annotation:** improve test to add contributors ([e9841d4](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e9841d4774bceeb3fbc5d23f7d96f091ffa74f78))
* **nerve:** use data from the form elements to update the entity ([01a0c37](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/01a0c37a043f3f6897dcc85cf0118db03d52186a))
* **nssi[nerve]:** skip teiheader when sending document to nssi[nerve] ([f797df5](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/f797df52ec76ea28d7c4e847f4ce282ab914fde5)), closes [#285](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/285)
* **schematags:** filter tags using uppercase input ([7b8ce13](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/7b8ce13a6bd5b823cacd57fb88824e0b5363acf0)), closes [#286](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/286)
* assure single attribute dropdown is an array instead of a string ([d69e8a9](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/d69e8a972afe81fb8cd7c9340e38a87284e05b66)), closes [#283](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/283)


### Code Refactoring

* **gitdialog:** provide writer instance to logout component ([9bc1ae6](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/9bc1ae684f855e4693e2dcc6df2faa39d227c9a2))


### Features

* 🎸 config commitzen. Bump up version due to CI changes ([d7119e5](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/d7119e5eefca3d771df48af8bd85dcfd23695f27))
* 🎸 travis-ci tweak ([7e0f4ad](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/7e0f4ad31d8adc9e29afd6e80d3346ed145ae4a1))
* 🎸 travis-ci tweaks ([448f75f](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/448f75fabae02e7ef7763f9055329d857447e167))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **gitdialog:** provide writer instance to logout component
result.name: v7.0.0

result.description:
# [6.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v5.1.6...v6.0.0) (2020-07-27)


### Bug Fixes

* **note tag:** add warning popup if note type is required ([936ad4d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/936ad4df64b334c2b4533e9594d889799904277d))
* fix bug on funcion definition ([87f2eac](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/87f2eac84a2501c48a347b61bb793c59823f75f4))
* **dialog:** update dialog message for space in textfields ([e2fe53f](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e2fe53ff1ce030ed1f80dff48bb0bf79494a9d98))
* **message:** only call callbacks if exists ([6da0bf4](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/6da0bf4b2ff884596671af6aededfb9a2a34050f))
* **settings:** fix function name typo ([5883e1b](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5883e1be94af771daf42bc732d2e7dfd22be512e))
* **tagger:** hide notes by default ([c02695e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/c02695e8162755317998a842f15619ad505cfb96)), closes [#276](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/276)


### Features

* **annotation:** default any unknow type to cwrc:Note ([36a7188](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/36a718856a60b9c184052550f60bc49dbc51ad0f))
* **annotation: note:** allows 'other' type for Tei-lite ([02d1d3f](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/02d1d3f18fa344455ce19c3f4f5c2e81b5993ef0))
* **annotation: note:** extend support for dynamic type to other schemas ([14c0e6e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/14c0e6e156a0cd6fd87e734430ce6c45fdfc7278))
* **mapping:** conform to the new TEI LITE support to named tags person, place, and org ([b3ee330](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b3ee33066661f01a94a0ac19e69ec8f4a0e6a3f8))
* **tag note:** load type att dynamically and allow for custom input ([b4a943e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b4a943e1bf0964cdf4151beb7b010238c2c76de9)), closes [#274](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/issues/274)


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **annotation: note:** Note dialog is share by all schemas and it need to account for their variations.
* **mapping:** match the tag name directly with the parentTag instead of using process using
xpath.
* **tag note:** options are pulled dinamically. Checks need to be done while building the dialog.
result.name: v6.0.0

# [5.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v4.0.0...v5.0.0) (2020-03-06)


### Bug Fixes

* **annotations:** add fractional seconds to annotation ID in order to reduce chance of duplicate IDs ([b3c92bc](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b3c92bc513b29bf1f595cd2b99799c43c0315c5d))
* **attributes:** allow setting initial values in attribute widget while in ADD mode ([02dd3cc](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/02dd3cc2ec1e40f6a344e09f3c3f68c93e8be3a5))

* **build:** remove path-exists ([bdb2fa4](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/bdb2fa4154006f3038be95b39d78fd0f78524b0e))
* **conversion:** export empty tags as a singular tag ([5f1bc1a](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5f1bc1a9409f25ec690d510f3a883b81362fd724))
* **conversion:** preserve comments ([cb3d735](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/cb3d735f364cc4ffbfd5e759ca2113c2aa1e4a82))
* **entities:** ensure old required attributes are removed when changing entity type ([ecf0acb](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/ecf0acbd110c4ca1fc0862bf2f4082a3327c39c9))
* **entities:** set new dateCreated when cloning an entity ([035276d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/035276d1086da9579ee5f687e39c3d2939902969))
* change import for require to load jquery-ui ([e7b076f](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e7b076fe8ccd106354ac3b08eeb9f35070567515))
* revert changes made to import dependencies ([930b636](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/930b6369391cd1799488821ff94383e8a3dd0806))
* **schema:** add handling for when schema definition is missing ([4eb79ed](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/4eb79ed9406dfdac6c6a47ea128998cc0a21b656))
* **tinymce:** update tinymce to version 4.9.8 ([0be6e75](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/0be6e75e136b92a508a3918b9d76e4a7cdffa894))
* **translation:** add text parent tag ([3b724b9](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/3b724b9bdc47bf3c7e6b090fb976ab3c73159d11))
* **translation:** add type=translation to parent tag ([95bfed4](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/95bfed4832f74daa534b00691496c3e9dbb50c8f))
* **translation:** check to make sure a valid tag is selected ([2a7e1c5](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/2a7e1c52701eae14e8a617205b102418f8a59d31))
* **translation:** fix for 3 letter abbreviation languages showing up ([822fe40](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/822fe40c15de4db2ef111c8724ecf0f97d815127))
* **translation:** hide responsibility if not available for schema ([df2bdbe](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/df2bdbe509a002f34691c196d984bd5e9037bcf6))
* fix for cursor moving outside of entity when editing ([7384e92](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/7384e92db3214c5daf83c9c054131a4cf5ed112a))


### Code Refactoring

* change require to import due to changes on Entities List ([e421a7d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e421a7d1a57c19e7e7ca186e849c92cf00dd964d))


### Features

* **nerve:** add status filtering to nerve entity filter selection ([dac93ee](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/dac93ee0afc9d92a68802d895fe02403984673ac))


### Reverts

* **sidebar ui:** revert changes to the UI made at commits 6c3dc16 and 43248af ([173fc38](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/173fc38509e8e2c32e7e86dc3c81da7ec80c7c47))
* **sidebar ui:** revert changes to the UI made at commits 6c3dc16 and 43248af ([2694aee](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/2694aee52a4099715889467d302ad9a69b19c51e))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* EntitiesList.js, layoutmanager.js, and writer.js must be import rather than require
(es6)

result.description:
# [4.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v3.4.0...v4.0.0) (2020-01-28)


### Bug Fixes

* track open message dialogs, add destroy method ([c384432](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/c384432))
* **css:** remove bootstrap from css build ([4b74e42](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/4b74e42))
* **css:** remove gap that appears when hovering over entity list items ([db525d5](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/db525d5))
* **delete:** consider whether contents are being removed when validating delete ([96f4c40](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/96f4c40))
* **entities:** fix issues related to tagging and mapping ([5cba7e6](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5cba7e6))
* **entity:** fix for duplicate entity ranges ([2390b88](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/2390b88))
* **imageViewer:** fix for openseadragon error: Viewport._setContentBounds ([ad3096f](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/ad3096f))
* **nerve:** re-work done behaviour, add title to filter, add edited indicator ([7a76cf0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/7a76cf0))
* **nerve:** send context with nerve call. several nerve related fixes. ([4a05411](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/4a05411))
* **nerve:** use processArray for acceptAll and rejectAll. actually publish massUpdateCompleted event ([f005f97](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/f005f97))
* **note:** update note content after removing a child of a note ([f1c3dae](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/f1c3dae))
* **notes:** update note contents and entities list after altering or removing note text ([5bb2025](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5bb2025))
* **popup:** show link for citation if no content exists ([1efc249](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/1efc249))
* **rdflib:** rename to $rdf ([4926f6c](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/4926f6c))
* **schema:** fix for documentation that contains tags ([6ca4d5e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/6ca4d5e))
* Fix loadSchemaCSS parameter: from string to an object ([77200e1](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/77200e1))
* **schema:** fix for when schema url is undefined ([db37358](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/db37358))
* **schema:** fixes for addSchema and getRootForSchema ([f3604fe](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/f3604fe))
* use stringToXML for schema responses ([b5befd3](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b5befd3))
* **schema:** rework processDocument and schema url tracking in order to preserve document schema url ([8c471e2](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/8c471e2))
* add processingDocument listeners for writer and entitiesManager ([6290da0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/6290da0))
* add scope to css for popups in order to prevent it from styling the whole app ([cbe3ba9](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/cbe3ba9))
* add zero-width non-breaking space to tag who's content has been removed ([1113227](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/1113227))
* Change Schema Config to list alternative url as arrays ([75b3131](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/75b3131))
* Convert Schema to XML when requested from the proxy server ([e537cc9](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e537cc9))
* **xml2cwrc:** handle case when loading where schema is the same but css is different ([c2f6117](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/c2f6117))
* fix for noteContent not being set when converting to entity ([15ca6bc](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/15ca6bc))
* fix for schema URL not being sent to validation service ([6a446be](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/6a446be))
* **tree:** fix css issue ([b5bbc6a](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b5bbc6a))
* fix for undefined schema url sent to nerve ([9c0778d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/9c0778d))
* fix undefined variable error ([7be09ef](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/7be09ef))
* move reservedAttributes to Mapper ([06f8795](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/06f8795))
* **tags:** fix for duplicate tags caused by pressing enter ([4a2f66e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/4a2f66e))
* **UI:** Change edit tag to edit tag/entity ([5cc1ee2](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5cc1ee2))
* **UI:** Change error message when loading mal-formed xml ([719a672](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/719a672))
* **UI:** Change underscore color for person entity. ([fc4427d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/fc4427d))
* **undo:** add undo step after paste ([5a9d250](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/5a9d250))
* show customValues in entities list ([92f0d65](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/92f0d65))
* test for existence of dialog before calling method on it ([1dd7e97](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/1dd7e97))


### Build System

* **rdflib:** move rdflib outside of node_modules ([3f8e89b](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/3f8e89b))


### Code Refactoring

* **schema:** remove unused startText parameter from loadSchema ([68e8740](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/68e8740))


### Features

* **delete:** improve prevent delete functionality, add delete invalidation check ([b17eb4d](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/b17eb4d))
* add mass update events and listeners for better handling of expensive operations ([8ef0307](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/8ef0307))
* Add the possibility to load schemas either through a proxy or directly through the browser ([c14c4c2](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/c14c4c2))
* change Schema loading ([e2e8108](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/e2e8108))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **schema:** loadSchema method signature has changed
* Change Schema XML and CSS loading functions
* schemaProxyURL must be provided through GitWrite.
* config format has changed
* **rdflib:** requires changes to the webpack config "externals" property

# [3.0.0](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/compare/v2.52.0...v3.0.0) (2019-08-28)


### Features

* **rdf:** use rdflib for conversion from json-ld to rdf/xml ([8a69f4e](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/8a69f4e))
* merge rdflib with master branch ([39d12c8](https://github.com/cwrc/CWRC-WriterBase/commit/39d12c8))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* writer.getDocument has been replaced with writer.getDocumentXML and
writer.getDocumentString, and now take callbacks
* **rdf:** getDocument and getDocumentContent now take a callback instead of returning a
string/XML
result.name: v3.0.0

result.description:
